## InvocationOptions type

Options to control invocations

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type InvocationOptions = {
    skipParameterInjection?: boolean;
    skipInterceptors?: boolean;
    source?: InvocationSource;
    session?: ResolutionSession;
};
```
